name: percona-server-mongodb
description: Percona Server for MongoDB Replica Set on Mesosphere DC/OS
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS Percona Server for MongoDB service is being installed. 

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/percona-server-mongodb/
	Issues: https://jira.percona.com/secure/CreateIssue!default.jspa?pid=12402.
postUninstallNotes: The DC/OS Percona Server for MongoDB service is being uninstalled.
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 1024 MB MEM | 1 1000 MB Disk
